title: Diamond Dreams
imgSmText: Young pitcher fights odds
imgText: A small-town baseball prodigy battles injuries, doubt, and rivals as he strives to reach the Major Leagues, proving resilience is stronger than talent alone.

title: Last Swing
imgSmText: Japanese sumo ringer's path to victory
imgText: Japanese boy overcomes injury, death, poverty and alcoholism to become the greatest sumo fighter in Japan.

title: Broken Field
imgSmText: UK cricket star overcomes injury
imgText: After a devastating injury, a once-promising football star must rebuild his life and career, pushing his limits to make an improbable return to the game.

title: Heart in the Game
imgSmText: Footballer finds unexpected love
imgText: A rising football player falls in love with a journalist, forcing him to choose between fame, family expectations, and a future built on true connection.

title: Iron Will
imgSmText: French UFC fighter rises and climbs the ranks against all expectations
imgText: A French mixed martial artist overcomes poverty and prejudice to climb the UFC ranks, fighting not just opponents but his own demons.

title: Chasing Gold
imgSmText: Refugee from Kongo runs for Olympics
imgText: A young African refugee escapes war and finds himself running toward Olympic glory, showing the world the power of survival and determination.

title: Blades of Silence
imgSmText: Russian skater defies pressure
imgText: A Russian figure skater must balance national pride, harsh training, and her own desire for freedom as she prepares for the world stage.

title: Kicking Boundaries
imgSmText: Indian girls form soccer team
imgText: In rural India, a group of young women form a soccer team against cultural resistance, uniting their village and proving their strength.

title: Fallen Champion
imgSmText: German star battles addiction
imgText: A German World Cup hero struggles with alcoholism after glory fades, risking everything before finding redemption.

title: High Ascent
imgSmText: Austrian climber faces peril
imgText: An Austrian mountaineer risks everything to conquer one of the Alps' deadliest peaks, testing his endurance, fear, and fragile family ties.

title: The Rivalry
imgSmText: Two Swedish runners collide
imgText: Two Swedish sprinters push each other to the limits in a bitter rivalry, only to discover respect and friendship beyond the finish line.

title: Silent Balance
imgSmText: Iranian yoga teacher inspires
imgText: In Tehran, a male yoga instructor defies social norms to open a studio, guiding students toward peace while facing cultural resistance.

title: Beyond the Net
imgSmText: Volleyball team unites and takes down a whole nation
imgText: A struggling high school volleyball team learns discipline and trust, eventually surprising the nation in a championship run.

title: Frozen Rink
imgSmText: Underdog hockey team rises
imgText: A small-town hockey team rebuilds after near collapse, bonding through harsh winters and relentless training to reach national glory.

title: Track of Hope
imgSmText: Teen finds purpose in track
imgText: A troubled teenager discovers a gift for running, turning away from crime and toward a brighter future with the help of a mentor.

title: The Last Inning
imgSmText: An aging catcher mentors a rookie pitcher with a blazing fastball.
imgText: A veteran catcher in his final season must guide a talented but wild rookie pitcher, helping him harness his skill and navigate the pressures of Major League Baseball.

title: Southpaw's Redemption
imgSmText: A minor league player gets one last shot at the majors with a new team.
imgText: After years in the minors, a journeyman left-handed pitcher is given a surprise call-up and must prove he belongs before his dream finally slips away.

title: The Comeback
imgSmText: A quarterback fights to return to the field after a devastating injury.
imgText: A star QB's career is nearly ended by a severe knee injury. This is the story of his painful, against-all-odds rehabilitation to lead his team one more time.

title: Blind Side Route
imgSmText: A football player falls for his biggest critic, a tough sports journalist.
imgText: When a star wide receiver's performance dips, he clashes with a sharp journalist. Their professional rivalry slowly turns into an unexpected and complicated romance.

title: Le Combatant
imgSmText: A mixed martial artist from Paris fights for his family's future.
imgText: A working-class father from the banlieues of Paris uses his raw fighting talent in the UFC to provide a better life for his daughter and escape his difficult past.

title: The Olympian
imgSmText: A refugee from South Sudan runs for a new country and a new hope.
imgText: After fleeing war-torn South Sudan, a young man discovers his incredible talent for long-distance running. He must overcome trauma and adapt to a new world to compete.

title: Ice and Desire
imgSmText: A Russian figure skater's ambition threatens her personal relationships.
imgText: A talented but ruthless skater will do anything to win Olympic gold, pushing her body and her relationships with her coach and family to the absolute breaking point.

title: Shakti Kicks
imgSmText: An underdog Indian women's soccer team fights for respect and victory.
imgText: A new coach unites a group of girls from different castes and backgrounds to form India's first national women's soccer team, challenging deep-seated sexism and prejudice.

title: Der Abpfiff
imgSmText: A World Cup hero's life spirals into alcoholism after his career ends.
imgText: After scoring the winning goal in the World Cup final, a German footballer struggles with fame and identity. After retirement, his life descends into a battle with addiction.

title: The North Face
imgSmText: An Austrian climber attempts a solo ascent of a deadly mountain peak.
imgText: Based on a true story, a legendary free climber prepares for the ultimate challenge: a solo climb of the most dangerous face of the Eiger without ropes or support.

title: Rivalen
imgSmText: Two Swedish middle-distance runners push each other to the breaking point.
imgText: Two fierce rivals dominate the world of track and field. Their intense competition drives them to break world records, but their mutual obsession threatens to consume them.

title: The Breath of Life
imgSmText: An Iranian yoga instructor finds freedom and community through sport.
imgText: In a restrictive society, a woman finds solace and a sense of self through the practice of yoga. She secretly starts a class for other women, creating a movement.

title: The Final Bell
imgSmText: An aging boxer takes one last fight to save his local gym.
imgText: A former contender, now in his 40s, must get back in the ring for a high-stakes bout to win the money needed to save the community gym that saved him as a kid.

title: The Sixth Round
imgSmText: A female tennis star stages an incredible comeback at Wimbledon.
imgText: Down and out with an injury, a former champion is given a wild card entry to Wimbledon. She must battle through the pain and her own self-doubt for one last shot at glory.

title: The Long Drive Home
imgSmText: A washed-up golfer qualifies for the Open at St. Andrews.
imgText: A club pro who never made it big unexpectedly qualifies for the British Open at the home of golf. He travels to Scotland with his estranged son as his caddy.
